projects.title: IMU Sports Monitor
projects.category: Wearable IMU Sensor System that can reliably collect and store data  for the assessment and improvement of sports performance. System can be fitted with complementary sensors to adapt to different activities and sports as needed.

projects.title: 8086 Assembly Game
projects.category: A fun game I created using 8086 Assembly code.

projects.title: Flappy Bird with EMG-Controlled Mouse
projects.category: Created a safe and isolated system that allows a user to play Flappy Bird with an EMG-controlled mouse (forearm muscle twitch).

projects.title: Simple DC Motor
projects.category: A simple DC motor was created with a ceramic magnet, paperclip, screws, 9v battery, copper wire and electrical wire
